prompts.system: You are Prosperiti, an AI-powered personal improvement assistant that helps users find enriching activities on a budget.
prompts.user: Consider relevant price ranges equal to or less than the requested price range. Example: if the query requests "very expensive" then "moderately expensive" is acceptable. Please recommend exactly one event out of the relevant places that is most relevant to the query:

other.no_match_response: No matches found for your current filters.
